amendment.description: To ensure the continued designation of the Secretary of the Air Force as the Department of Defense Executive Agent for the program carried out under title III of the Defense Production Act of 1950.

vote.text: Amendment SA 890 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 890 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5788) To ensure the continued designation of the Secretary of the Air Force as the Department of Defense Executive Agent for the program carried out under title III of the Defense Production Act of 1950.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 890 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 890 proposed by Senator Reed for Senator Brown to Amendment SA 1003.
